mapper.select: SELECT M.MAIL_NO , E.NICK SEND , M.RECEIVE , M.TITLE , M.CONTENT , M.ENROLL_DATE , R.STAR , R.REFERENCE , R.READ_YN FROM MAIL M INNER JOIN MAIL_RECEIVE R ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON M.SEND = E.EMP_NO WHERE M.STATUS=0 AND M.RECEIVE=${empNo}

SELECT M.MAIL_NO , E.NICK SEND , M.RECEIVE , M.TITLE , M.CONTENT , M.ENROLL_DATE , R.STAR , R.REFERENCE , R.READ_YN FROM MAIL M INNER JOIN MAIL_RECEIVE R ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON M.SEND = E.EMP_NO WHERE M.STATUS=0 AND M.MAIL_NO = ${mailNo}
